mapper.select: select a.* from fence_entity a,station b where a.station_id=b.id and a.is_deleted='n' and b.is_deleted='n' and b.status='QUIT'

select a.* from fence_entity a, partner_station_rel b where a.is_deleted='n' and b.is_deleted='n' and a.station_id=b.station_id and a.template_id in #{templateId}
and b.state in('SERVICING','DECORATING','CLOSING') and b.type <> #{type}
